news.title: Homeland Security is trying to force tech companies to hand over data about Trump critics
news.summary: The use of administrative subpoenas, which are not subject to judicial oversight, are used to demand a wealth of information from tech companies, including the owners of anonymous online accounts documenting ICE operations.

news.title: China bans all retractable car door handles, starting next year
news.summary: The pop-out door handle ban starts in 2027 for new cars, 2029 for existing models.
